016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.core;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.json.JsonElement;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
022import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
023import org.apache.logging.log4j.status.StatusLogger;
024import org.glassfish.hk2.api.PopulatorPostProcessor;
025import org.glassfish.hk2.api.ServiceLocator;
026import org.glassfish.hk2.utilities.DescriptorImpl;
027
028import java.util.*;
029import java.util.function.Consumer;
030import java.util.function.Function;
031
032/**
033 * This processor checks configuration for the following for each service:
034 * servicename.enabled = true/false (whether to load this service)
035 * servicename.metadata = object with name/value pairs (additional service metadata, potentially overriding annotations)
036 *
037 * @param configuration
038 */
039public record ConfigurationPostPopulatorProcessor(Configuration configuration, Consumer<String> monitor)
040        implements PopulatorPostProcessor {
041
042    @Override
043    public DescriptorImpl process(ServiceLocator serviceLocator, DescriptorImpl descriptorImpl) {
044
045        String name = descriptorImpl.getName();
046        if (name != null) {
047            String enabledFlag = Optional.ofNullable(descriptorImpl.getMetadata().get("enabled"))
048                    .flatMap(l -> l.stream().findFirst())
049                    .orElseGet(() -> name + ".enabled");
050
051            // Check if we should use defaults
052            if (!configuration.has(enabledFlag)) {
053                enabledFlag = "defaults.enabled";
054            }
055
056            if (configuration.getFalsy(enabledFlag)
057                    .orElseGet(() -> false)) {
058                configuration.getConfiguration(name).getObjectAs("metadata", object ->
059                {
060                    Map<String, List<String>> metadatas = new HashMap<>();
061                    Function<JsonNode, List<String>> mapper = new Function<>() {
062                        @Override
063                        public List<String> apply(JsonNode json) {
064                            if (json instanceof ArrayNode an) {
065                                List<String> values = new ArrayList<>();
066                                an.forEach(node -> values.addAll(apply(node)));
067                                return values;
068                            } else {
069                                return List.of(json.asText());
070                            }
071                        }
072                    };
073                    JsonElement.toFlatMap(metadatas, "", object, mapper);
074                    return metadatas;
075                }).ifPresent(descriptorImpl::addMetadata);
076                monitor.accept("Enabled " + descriptorImpl.getImplementation() + "(" + enabledFlag + ": true)");
077                return descriptorImpl;
078            } else {
079                monitor.accept("Disabled " + descriptorImpl.getImplementation() + "(" + enabledFlag + ": false)");
080                return null;
081            }
082        } else {
083            return descriptorImpl;
084        }
085    }
086}
